price: (37) And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walahu al-kib'riyāu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
